project_id.description: The project organization ID - must be exactly 'org_P5F0bnCrRcdlNtZk'

function_id.description: The function identifier - must be either 'RETELL_TRANSFER_WEEKDAYS' or 'RETELL_TRANSFER_SATURDAY'

call_id.description: The Retell call ID - must be a valid call ID starting with 'call_'. DO NOT use 'unknown' or any placeholder value. Use Retell's call ID variable (e.g., {{call.call_id}} or {{call_id}} depending on your Retell version).
